game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, an artifact of great significance is said to be hidden. Uncover its location and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a legendary sword

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance among the ruins, guarded by ancient glyphs.
Inside the temple, solve the puzzles to reveal the chamber where the artifact is hidden.
